title: Magic Skills - Volume One
description: 22 Magic Skills SFX, 5 Medieval weapons SFX and 5 Horror SFX
longDescription:
Hello dev!


This pack contains 20 magic skills sound effects, and 10 sfx bonus, here's the list:


22 Magic Skills

  1. Fire Spell 01
  2. Fire Spell 02
  3. Debuff Spell 01
  4. Dark Matter Spell 01
  5. Dark Matter Spell 02
  6. Earth Spell 01
  7. Haste Spell 01
  8. Holy Spell 01
  9. Acid Spell 01
  10. Power Up Spell 01
  11. Ice Spell 01
  12. Shield Spell 01
  13. Slow Spell 01
  14. Teleport Spell 01
  15. Thunder Spell 01
  16. Water Spell 01
  17. Water Spell 02
  18. Wind Spell 01
  19. Wind Spell 02
  20. Heal Spell 01
  21. FlameThrower 01
  22. Poison Spell 01


Bonus -----

5 Medieval Weapons Sound effects

  1. Torch Sound 
  2. Bow Long Shot
  3. Balista
  4. Sword
  5. Dagga


Bonus ----- 

5 Horror Sound Effects

  1. Clean Scream
  2. Heavy Steps Wood
  3. Impact Scream
  4. Knife Hit
  5. Bell


Every sound comes with 2 variations + the original sound (you're not paying for the variations)


Check the preview

Check the documentation


- This pack will receive updates constantly (i'll try one every month), and from the moment you buy, you will never have to pay anything more for updates in the Magic Skills - Volume One.


License:

non-exclusive license – you’re free to use these packs in your commercial games. No license to claim as your own work.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 90 +

Number of Audio Cues: 90 +

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Documentation: Here

Important/Additional Notes: The font used is Beyond Wonderland free distributed for commercial use by 1001 font and the image is from pixabay free distributed for commercial use too.
